content: 2 stitches * repeat around 12 r7 r21 single_crochet around fasten_off stuff arms mouth r1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet chain 1 6 r2 single_crochet increase each stitch join chain 1 12 r3 - *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next stitch* repeat around join ch1 18 r4 - *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 2 stitches* repeat around join ch1 24 r5 r15 - single_crochet around join ch1 24 property of netty-knitz eyeball r1 with black yarn magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 r2 single_crochet increase in each stitch 12 r3 change to eye colour in this picture i used brown yarn but subsequently i use the stripe colour *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next stitch* repeat around 18 r4 change to white yarn - *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 2 stitches * repeat around 24 r5 - *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next 3 stitches * repeat around 30 r6 single_crochet around 30 r7 change back to yarn a single_crochet around 30 r8 in blo back loops only single_crochet around 30 r9 - r11 single_crochet around 30 r12 - *decrease single_crochet in next 3 stitches * repeat around 24 r13 - *decrease single_crochet in next 2 stitches * repeat around stuff eyeball firmly 18 r14 - *decrease single_crochet in next stitch * repeat around 12 r15 - *decrease* repeat around fasten_off with long tail to weave and close back of eyeball attach the eyeball to the top of the worry monster 6 in my most recent worry monsters i have opted for a thicker band of stripes in the colour sequence between r13 r24 i simply did 4 row of each colour i hope you enjoy this pattern
